    • Method Detail

      • findRandomId

        public int findRandomId()
        Returns:
        Finds a random 6-digit number that does not already exist in the PaymentCard * table. This random number is used as the PaymentCard ID

      • regNewPaymentCard

        public boolean regNewPaymentCard(PaymentCard newPaymentCard)
        Parameters:
        newPaymentCard - The PaymentCard object to be inserted into the database
        Returns:
        Registers a paymentcard in the database

      • setActiveStatus

        public boolean setActiveStatus(int cust_id,
                               boolean status)
        Parameters:
        cust_id - CustomerID of the customer whose paymentcard you want to activate/deactivate
        status - true - set as active, false - set as inactive
        Returns:
        We do not allow deletion of customer cards or customers from the database. * This method sets the payment card associated with a customer as inactive * An inactive paymentcard can not be used (can't add or deduct funds)

      • setBalance

        public boolean setBalance(int cust_id,
                          int amount)
        Parameters:
        cust_id - Customer ID
        amount - The amount to SET the customers balance to
        Returns:
        Sets the balance of a payment card associated with a customer to a certain number.

      • addFunds

        public boolean addFunds(int cust_id,
                        double amount)
        Parameters:
        cust_id - Customer ID
        amount - The amount to ADD to the customers balance
        Returns:
        Adds funds to the balance of the payment card associated with a customer

      • deductFunds

        public boolean deductFunds(int cust_id,
                           double amount)
        Parameters:
        cust_id - Customer ID
        amount - The amount to deduct from the customers balance
        Returns:
        Deducts funds from the balance of a payment card associated with a customer.

      • checkBalance

        public double checkBalance(int cust_id)
        Parameters:
        cust_id - Customer ID
        Returns:
        Returns the current balance of a given customer
